price: 83. Ne vois-tu pas que Nous avons envoyé aux mécréants des démons qui les poussent (à la rébellion) en permanence ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
